title: For Patients
intro: Information about how Health-AI benefits patients and protects your privacy.
content:
How Health-AI Benefits You

Health-AI is developing advanced artificial intelligence tools to help healthcare providers make better, faster diagnoses and treatment decisions. Our federated approach means your data stays secure within your healthcare institution while still contributing to breakthrough medical research.

Your Privacy is Protected

Unlike traditional AI development that requires collecting patient data in one location, Health-AI uses federated learning. This means your medical data never leaves your hospital. Instead, AI algorithms are brought to the data, trained locally, and only anonymous mathematical updates are shared between institutions.

What This Means for Healthcare

By enabling collaboration between healthcare institutions without compromising privacy, Health-AI can develop AI models that are more accurate and work better across different patient populations. This leads to more equitable healthcare outcomes for everyone.

faqs.question: Is my personal data being shared?
faqs.answer: No. Your personal medical data never leaves your healthcare institution. Health-AI uses federated learning, where only AI model updates (mathematical calculations) are shared, not patient data.

faqs.question: Do I need to consent to participate?
faqs.answer: Health-AI operates within the existing regulatory frameworks for medical research. Your healthcare provider will inform you about any research activities and your rights regarding your medical data.

faqs.question: Who has access to the AI systems?
faqs.answer: The AI systems developed by Health-AI are designed to assist healthcare professionals in their work. Only authorized medical staff at participating institutions have access to these tools.
